dialogs.buttonText: Can I cut these trees down?
dialogs.responseText: No. These trees are the property of Tsu City. You can't cut them down without permission!
You can't. Well, at least you can't right now. Maybe that will change if things go according to plan.
Look, I don't think I need to spell it out for you, I'm just a tree guard. Maybe try coming back in the future and things will have changed.
